entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
